doc.field: Global Petroleum corp said today it lowered the posted cargo prices for number six fuel in the new york harbor 45 to 75 cts a barrel, effective today. The decrease brings the prices for one pct sulphur to 20.75 dlrs, down 45 cts, two pct sulphur 20.10 dlrs, down 75 cts, 2.2 pct sulphur 19.75 dlrs, down 75 cts and 2.5 pct sulphur 19.50 dlrs, down 75 cts. Prices for 0.3 pct and 0.5 pct sulphur remained unchanged at 22.50 and 21.85 dlrs, it said. Reuter
